Invocation Name: animal chain
des:
Classical word chain game with Animals. Compete against Alexa chaining animal names without repeating any. You only need to say an animals name whose first letter match with the last letter of the previous animal name. 
It's perfect as an entertainment for kids and adults. Also cool to use in educational environments.

This game is really easy to use. You just need to tell alexa to start the game by saying for example: "Alexa, run Animal Chain" or "Alexa, start Animal Chain".
 Then Alexa will start. First it will ask you if you know the rules, if you do, you will go straight to the game. If you don't, Alexa will explain the rules with an example.
 Alexa always starts saying the animal, so you can take your time to search for another animal that match it's first letter with the last letter of the animal Alexa said, there is no time limit.
If you didn't hear Alexa's animal name, or you forgot, you can ask Alexa to repeat it by saying: "can you repeat?" or " say again".
If you don't know any animals, just say "I don't know more" or "I surrender".
To exit the game just say: "Stop" or "Cancel".
